title: Simplify Development Task Display
description: Remove Branch field, PR status message, and Rebase link from Development Task interface to reduce visual clutter and improve developer focus on core task information.
iWant: a clean Development Task interface without Branch, PR status, and Rebase elements
soThat: I can focus on task essentials without unnecessary UI distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch field no longer appears in Development Task view
PR created and ready for development message is removed
Rebase link is hidden from task action area
Task layout remains visually balanced after element removal
